title: Firecracker
summaries: The Firecracker is a Hardmode whip that is dropped by the Wall of Flesh with a 1/4 (25%) chance. Like other whips, it causes minions and sentries to focus on the last-struck enemy.
If the Firecracker hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 33%.
The Firecracker also inflicts the <linked>Hellfire</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> for 4 seconds to all targets struck.

When <linked>minion</linked> or <linked>sentry</linked> attacks an enemy marked by the Firecracker, a small explosion will occur, and the enemy takes 2.75 times the damage from the minion/sentry's attack. The explosion also hits nearby enemies for 1.75 times the damage. The mark can only be applied to one enemy per strike, and will not repeat itself until the enemy is struck again.
